questions.question: Did Machiavelli think it was better for a leader to be feared or loved?

choices.answer: Feared
Loved

questions.question: If Machiavelli could steal $20 and knew he would not get caught would he?

choices.answer: Yes
No

questions.question: If you were going to take over a country, what does Machiavelli recommend doing?

choices.answer: Using your own personal army.
Using your friend’s army
Poisoning the king and murdering his family.
Tell the people that the king is bad and you'd be better

questions.question: According to Machiavelli, what type of army should you have as a leader?

choices.answer: An army of well-trained soldiers that you pay to support you
An army of troops borrowed from your friends
An army of people from your own country
An army of love

questions.question: Which of these statements would Machiavelli agree with most?

choices.answer: Don’t worry about following laws, just do whatever you want
Don’t worry about laws, do anything to help your people
Follow the laws at all times
Follow the laws unless your country itself is in danger

questions.question: If your people wanted you to build them a sports arena, what does Machiavelli suggest you do?

choices.answer: Build it and let them in free, just make sure people see it.
Build it and charge them to come in
Ignore them
Explain that it would cost too much to build

questions.question: You catch a group of people talking about how bad of a ruler you are. Machiavelli suggests you

choices.answer: Kill them all!
Kill them all and their families!
Reason with them and tell them why they're wrong
Ask them nicely to stop

questions.question: Someone tells you that your sibling wants your throne. What does Machiavelli suggest you do?

choices.answer: Kill him/ her!
Trick them into telling you the truth
Ask him/ her calmly what's going on
Tell them who told you then discuss the situation

questions.question: According to Machiavelli, how should you show people how great of a ruler you are?

choices.answer: Build great roads, bridges, and statues
Make sure everyone has enough food
Build up your army and attack your most hated enemy
Make everyone bow down when you walk by

questions.question: Two of your neighboring countries go to war with each other. What does Machiavelli tell you do?

choices.answer: Don't pick sides, let them handle it.
Flip a coin and support that side
Offer to help whoever pays you more
Support the side your citizens like more

questions.question: Running a country is hard work! What kind of advisers would Machiavelli suggest to help you?

choices.answer: Friends and people you trust
People who pay you the most
People who think you're great and agree with you always
People who are wise and honest but may disagree with you

questions.question: According to Machiavelli, How should laws be decided in your country?

choices.answer: I make whatever laws I want
People vote on the laws
I don't worry about laws, my army takes care of everything
There are no laws in my country

questions.question: As a leader, what is most important to you (according to Machiavelli)?

choices.answer: Feeding your people
Making lots of $$$$
Having a strong army
Being known as a great leader

questions.question: When you conquer a place, what should you do with the old rulers (according to Machiavelli)?

choices.answer: Offer them a job so they won't be angry
Kill them and all their relatives!
Send them far away to a foreign country
Throw them in jail forever

questions.question: You want to conquer new lands, according to Machiavelli what kind of country would be best?

choices.answer: Country with a King and a strong army
Country with a king and a weak army
A country with a group of leaders and a strong army
A country with a group of leaders and a weak army

questions.question: There is a country with a very weak army next to you. According to Machiavelli what do you do?

choices.answer: Kill them all!
Help them get stronger
Force them to pay you or you will attack
Leave them alone

questions.question: There is a country with a very strong army next to you. What do you do?

choices.answer: Kill them all!
Help them get stronger
Force them to pay you or you will attack them
Leave them alone
